Text: UMBC’s campus until a later semester, you will need to submit a new “New F-1 Student Request” through the ISSS portal to receive an updated document. Your I-20 is not automatically updated. Note: You must request that your admission be deferred before requesting an updated I-20. Graduate students should submit a deferral form here - https://gradschool.umbc.edu/students/forms/, undergraduate students should email: admissions@umbc.edu
